item.title: PYTHON 技巧
item.author: 作者
item.description: Python Quick Grammar 1. 变量互换 1 2 3 4 a=1 b=2 a,b=b,a a,b (2, 1) 2. 连续赋值 1 2 a=b=c=50 a,b,c (50, 50, 50) 3. 自动解包 1 2 a,b,c=[1,2,3] a,b,c (1, 2, 3) 1 2 3 a,*others=[1,2,3,4] print(a) print(*others) 1 2

item.title: JUPYTER NOTEBOOK SHORTCUTS
item.author: 作者
item.description: Jupyter Notebook Shortcuts Command model Key Function 作用 Enter take you into edit mode 转入编辑模式 Shift-Enter run the current cell, select below 运行本单元，选中下个单元 Ctrl-Enter run selected cells 运行本单元 Alt-Enter
